and commenda- tion are essential, just as grease is necessary to wheels that they may run smoothly. 
"My part is played out," said Prince An- drew. "What's the use of talking about me? Let us talk about you," he added after a si- lence, smiling at his reassuring thoughts. 
That smile was immediately reflected on Pierre's face. 
"But what is there to say about me?" said Pierre, his face relaxing into a careless, merry smile. "What am I? An illegitimate son!" He suddenly blushed crimson, an
